HEY! Thanks for checking me out

I am not special but you make me feel that way!

What do I do?

I like to help people, the way I normally do that is through building easy to websites that help people solve a problem. I also like to help people fix their bikes and maintain hiking trails.

I use to speak at conferences, and run a user experience and technology meetup group in Denver, but now I try to help more one on one!
